entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 6.0 and 7.0 failing to decompress zlib stream that is decompressible by .NET Framework 4.7.2 #94246
  • [NativeAOT] Consider moving `Monitor.DebugBlockingScope` to be under `Lock` #94242
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] `Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.SimpleRunTests.BlazorBuildRunTest` failing on Windows #94240
  • [WASM] DotnetHostBuilder withDebugging does not accept a value of 0 #94238
  • [Android] WebRequest causes SSL exception on Android API <= 23 on .NET 8 #94230
  • NativeAOT tests crashing with infinite recursion in Lock #94227
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Globalization.Calendars.Hybrid.WASM.Tests` getting terminated #94225
  • gcstress0x3 hangs for osx arm64 Checked #94224
    9.0.0
  • [SslStress] SocketException (111): Connection refused #94222
    9.0.0
  • Signed division performed even when values are provably non-negative #94218
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement missing functionalities #94216
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement missing functionalities #94215
  • [browser][hybridGlobalization] Hybrid Globalization fails with AOT #94212
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 11 Regressions on 10/25/2023 1:04:28 PM #94228
  • Assembly.GetCallingAssembly() needs IL2026-like warning for Native AOT (and self contained) builds #94200
  • Dns.GetHostEntry returns hostnames which aren't valid DNS hostnames #94195

Closed

  • Timezone Tests Fail with TestReadyToRun on Linux in CI #94190
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] System.NotImplementedException: CORINFO_HELP_GETSYNCFROMCLASSHANDLE #77093
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] Http2_IncorrectServerPreface_RequestFailsWithAppropriateHttpProtocolException #92647
    9.0.0
  • gRPC client failed to establish TLS connection to grpc service #92788
  • Performance Issue with `IsWindowsService` due to Repeated Process Lookups #93613
    9.0.0
  • Metric description for `http.client.request.duration` does not match the spec #93945
    9.0.0
  • Only some enum values are interpreted as bytes, and not string, in custom JsonConverter. #94206
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.TryFromHexString #78472
    9.0.0
  • [browser][perf] Blazor startup regression 2023-04-21 #89631
    8.0.0
  • SA1136: Enum values should be on separate lines #94098
  • There is a difference in the Regex judgment results. #94156

PullRequests

Created

  • we need to skip the SIP region in the last step of handling the alloc region #94249
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add some sanity checking for SPMI JIT options arguments #94248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: morph blocks in RPO #94247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Aia Limit #94244
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94243
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Fix class construction recursion issue in `Lock` on NativeAOT #94241
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build Mac symbols in .dSYM bundle, not single .dwarf file #94237
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [ILLink analyzer] Move dynamic object logic into dataflow analysis #94236
    area-Meta, linkable-framework
  • tests\Loader - use 3 stripes for gcstress #94235
    area-Infrastructure
  • Do some cleanup on TimeSpan to ensure better inlining and clearer semantics #94226
    area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Swap loadvector* and loadvectorandunzip* #94220
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add more gcdump and gcinfo code. #94219
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] enable timer tests #94217
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] enable MT PLINQ #94214
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Additional QuicConnectionOptions #94211
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Tests build fix with BuildAsStandalone #94208
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] unify pthread pool size to 32 #94204
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Changes related to type casting errors, as well as cosmetic fixes #94198
    NO-MERGE, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94193
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Enable SA1136: Enum values should be on separate lines #94098 #94100
    area-Meta
  • Fix compilation of Synchronized method combined with generics #94203
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 118.0.5993.117, windows: 119.0.6045.59 #94144
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Annotate projects that aren't XML source of truth #94234
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • make Http2_RequestFailsWithAppropriateHttpProtocolException test more deterministic #94112
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] do not contain `LEA` if offset < 0` #93992
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.15
  • JIT: make global morph its own phase #94185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • hosting windows service helper enhancement #93771
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [browser] Disable AOT Hybrid Globalization wbt #94221
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, disabled-test
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable failing outerloop tests for native AOT #94213
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update `http.client.request.duration` metric description #94061
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Change Not IsWindows condition to IsLinux on Socket test disable #94163
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Improve branch on condition code for s390x #94201
    area-VM-meta-mono, arch-s390x, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] use portable timer #94180
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] Disabling tests failing in the last two weeks on MT. #94051
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono
  • ARM64: Fix Vector64x2/3/4 API comments. Minor cleanup in AdvSimd. #94188
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics

Updated

  • Make ValueTuple members that can be made readonly readonly #90773
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #93901
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tar: Only treat reparse points marked as junctions or symlinks as actual tar symlinks #89102
    needs-author-action, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Simplify surrogate handling logic in WebUtlity #93515
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Add an additional length check to FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet #92546
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Improve and unify debug views of dictionaries. #92534
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Improve the help message in build.ps1 #92192
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • BigInteger constructor perf #91176
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Optimize cancellation handling in Hosting #93949
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Implements new `int`and `long` overloads for `TimeSpan` #94143
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Having space in path fails builds #92399
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [draft][browser] Run unit tests on multithreaded runtime with multithreaded xunit runner #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser
  • [iOS][non-icu] Implement missing Locale and Casing functions #94038
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [browser] logging and exit improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Arm64: Update certain encodings of instructions to make them size agnostic #94104
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Complex Rune enumeration over spans of UTF-16 and UTF-8 text #87927
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [wasm] Fix AOT publish in paths with space on Windows #94166
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Floating NaN overflow test fix #94168
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] enable threading API features #94167
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement StoreVectorNxM for Arm64 #94129
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [mono] Test upgrading to ICU 72.3 #93756
    needs-area-label
  • Enumerable.ToArray performance improvement using InlineArray #90459
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Update SystemdHelpers.cs #94191
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • StringBuilder.Replace with ReadOnlySpan<char> #93938
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][mono][aot] Implementation of nollvm init method #89074
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
